H0.text: Solid rock covers most of Earth's surface.

H1.text: Molten rock covers most of the surface of Earth.

H2.text: Ice is the substance that covers most of the Earth's surface.

H3.text: Water covers most of the Earth's surface.

A4.text: Water covers about 71.0% of the Earth's surface, with seas and oceans making up most of the water volume (about 96.5%).
